author: trawick
msg: a setsid() failure as fatal, as the usual cause is that the
caller is already a process group leader.

author: bnicholes
msg: Fixing up the NetWare headers to be compatible with the GNU compiler

author: trawick
msg: Fix some problems with non-blocking socket handling on unix
that resulted in infinite timeouts being used for non-blocking
sockets with apr_socket_connect() and some read/write calls.

author: trawick
msg: fix some minor style problems (indention, curly braces)

author: trawick
msg: Fix a bug in socket timeout handling on unix that left the
socket non-blocking after disabling the timeout.
